prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Guitar, Organ, Synth Pad, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Guitar, Organ, and a Synth Pad, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Bass, Guitar, Organ, and a Synth Pad, yet Piano is absent.

Style 3:
No Piano is present in this song, but it does include Drums, Bass, Guitar, Organ, and a Synth Pad.
